attributes.action: stop nhs staff pay rrp to being removed
attributes.additional_details:
some groups of nhs staff receive a payment each month to bring there pay in line with that of comparable workers outside the nhs this amounts in some cases
to £3000 a year. yes on top of a 2 year wage freeze the government want to take away this payment as their are plenty of people out there who will do the jobs for less than a living wage. sign to prevent this injustice
all these workers are skilled in my case maintenance
workers,others work in labs ,pharmacy,ect the nhs is not just about doctors and nurses kick away the foundations that support it and it will collapse.
